GAME 3: BRUINS AT RANGERS > Underway (NBCSN)

Live blog: Rangers get first goal of game in second

The Bruins and the Rangers are going head-to-head in their third matchup of the playoff series, with Boston taking both games so far. Follow our blog for live updates.

Neo-Nazi: 'Kill as many non-whites as possible'

“I decided I was going to kill as many non-whites as possible, and then kill myself,’’ Keith Luke told police after allegedly killing two Cape Verdeans, his defense attorney said today in court.

Tornado fears strike southwestern Mass.

The National Weather Service issued a tornado warning for that corner of the state after a weather spotter in New York saw one heading near Massachusetts. (6:03 p.m.)
